name: GFK Sales Report
query:
select
  details.brand as `Brand:Data:150`,
  details.item_code as `Item Code:Link/Item:150`,
  sum(qty) as `Qty:Float:100`,
  avg(rate) as `Average Rate:Float:150`
from
  `tabSales Invoice Item` details,
  `tabSales Invoice` inv
where
  inv.name=details.parent
  and inv.docstatus = 1
  and inv.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
  and details.brand regexp ( %(brands_array)s )
group by details.item_code
order by details.brand, details.item_code
